## Amazon Q Business Enables Public-Facing Chatbots  

Amazon has updated its Q Business AI assistant to support anonymous user access, allowing companies to build public-facing chatbots. The AWS-hosted tool can now be deployed on websites and support portals to answer questions, provide summaries, and complete tasks.  

This enhancement broadens Q Business’s utility beyond internal enterprise use, offering businesses a new way to engage customers. The move aligns with Amazon’s push to expand its AI offerings in competitive markets.
